channel.title: renovation on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.
channel.description: Recent content in renovation on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.

item.title: Renovation
item.description: The laboratory room was significantly renovated! The floor has been an issue in the last couple of years; an uneven surface with holes and duct tapes was not safe and made it difficult to put the desks and chairs.
